NationMania.core

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • NationMania.core.State

  • public class State
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that holds basic information for every state.
    If the State has been randomized during a game, it contains all it's related facts from the DB, ordered and divided to buckets

      private double probability 
      private SortedFacts stateFacts

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getContinent()
      Called when player ask for the "get continent" clue
      int getID() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      double getProbability() 
      SortedFacts getStateFacts() 
      double getWeight() 
      private void initStateFacts()
      Called from function "setStateFacts".
      boolean isAlreadyChosen()
      Called after randomizing a state.
      java.lang.Runnable logState()
      Called at the end of every round, except the last one (last round is the one when the time ran out, or the player quitted
      the game.
      Update the game information in DB by adding this state ID, and the ID of all it's facts that displayed this round.
      This is done be a new thread, in order to not disturb the flow of the game.
      void setProbability(double probability)
      Sets the probability of the state
      void setStateFacts()
      Called every time a state is randomized.
      Gets all facts that belongs to this state from the DB, while sorting them into buckets according to their difficulty.
      In case accessing the DB failed (if connection is lost or table is damaged), prints an error message to the user
      and quits the game.

             java.lang.String name,

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Returns:
        state ID as appear in DB

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        state name as appear in DB

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight()
        Returns:
        state weight as appear in DB. The weight uses in calculation of the probability the state will be randomized

      • getProbability

        public double getProbability()
        Returns:
        state probabilitiy to be randomized Ther probability is a combination of the state weight and the game difficulty

      • setProbability

        public void setProbability(double probability)
        Sets the probability of the state
        Parameters:
        probability - value calculated base on the state weight and game difficulty

      • initStateFacts

        private void initStateFacts()
        Called from function "setStateFacts". Initiallize the state facts list

      • setStateFacts

        public void setStateFacts()
        Called every time a state is randomized.
        Gets all facts that belongs to this state from the DB, while sorting them into buckets according to their difficulty.
        In case accessing the DB failed (if connection is lost or table is damaged), prints an error message to the user
        and quits the game.

      • getStateFacts

        public SortedFacts getStateFacts()
        Returns:
        the orderd facts list of this state

      • getContinent

        public java.lang.String getContinent()
        Called when player ask for the "get continent" clue
        Returns:
        the continent name which this state belongs to.

      • isAlreadyChosen

        public boolean isAlreadyChosen()
        Called after randomizing a state.
        Returns:
        true if this state has already been played in the current game.

      • logState

        public java.lang.Runnable logState()
        Called at the end of every round, except the last one (last round is the one when the time ran out, or the player quitted
        the game.
        Update the game information in DB by adding this state ID, and the ID of all it's facts that displayed this round.
        This is done be a new thread, in order to not disturb the flow of the game.
        Returns:
        Runnable - use to start new thread via the Executer.
